display_name: Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index: Sleep disturbances component subscore
description:
Subscore based on 9 items from Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index, with a range of 0-3. A score of "0" indicates no difficulty, while a score of "3" indicates severe difficulty. [Buysse et. al 1989 (PubMed ID: 2748771)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/2748771/)

External semantic reference: [CDE](https://cde.nlm.nih.gov/deView?tinyId=m1XpimqorC)

[Search for all PSQI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/mesa/variables?search=psqi)

Source: :psqi_5b:, :psqi_5c:, :psqi_5d:, :psqi_5e:, :psqi_5f:, :psqi_5g:, :psqi_5h:, :psqi_5i:, :psqi_5j:
